q:
In Databricks, which of the following statements about the SQL Analytics Dashboards are correct:
Statements

  1. By default, dashboards are sorted in reverse chronological order by the USAGE BY column.
  2. You can filter the list of dashboards by the list of dashboards you have created, by favorites, and by tags.
    Â

In Databricks, you are working on the Dashboards. You are required to implement a task to refresh a dashboard automatically. Now, you have selected from a Refresh every drop-down list for this process. If you have not choosen any SQL query, then which of the following actions will be implemented with respect to the SQL endpoint in this sceanrio?

a.option: The query will execute on the last used endpoint
The query will execute on the most popular endpoint
The query will execute on the first created endpoint
